name: Harrison Mark
description:
am a caring man looking for a nice woman to marry
I define myself: I am an honest and faithful man with a very tender heart. I`m also very open, soft spoken, sensitive, and sensitive to other`s feelings, as well as very affectionate and fun loving. There is no greater feeling to me than to make others happy and see a smile on their faces. I am kind of silly some times as I do like to have fun and laugh! I enjoy the simple things in life. Just give me a big smile, a kiss and hug, ! I am also a very, very romantic and passionate man.I have no drug or drinking habits, I`m not presently on any medication, I don’t make promises about a perfect life. Life is an adventure with its share of hard times as well as good times. What I can promise is moments of sheer joy, times of laughing so hard it hurts, moments so touching and tender they bring a tear to your eyes. I promise you love and laughter and kisses that take your breath away.
